name: Shark Wizard
storyline:
After your magic spell goes horribly wrong, you somehow managed to turn an entire village into humanoid sharks, and now they want revenge!
Use your magic banana gun and rubber duck on a stick to defend your tower!
summary:
After your magic spell goes horribly wrong, you somehow managed to turn an entire village into humanoid sharks, and now they want revenge!

Originally created for a Global Game Jam, this tower defense game is unlike any other and makes no sense.
